participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, loves trying new tricks on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i'm always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders. i have a broken arm.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and cynical, often feels trapped in his current situation.
participant_2.background: i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.
